H0.text: Who was assassinated in 1968 in the Ambassador Hotel in Los Angeles. Martin Luther King Jr.

H1.text: Who was assassinated in 1968 in the Ambassador Hotel in Los Angeles. Hubert Humphrey

H2.text: Who was assassinated in 1968 in the Ambassador Hotel in Los Angeles. Eugene McCarthy

H3.text: Who was assassinated in 1968 in the Ambassador Hotel in Los Angeles. RFK

A4.text: Kennedy was shot by Sirhan Sirhan, a 24-year-old Palestinian, in retaliation for his support of Israel following the 1967 Six-Day War.

A5.text: Kennedy was pronounced dead at 1:44 a.m. (PDT) on June 6, 1968.
